content: In the Harry Potter series, name the four Hogwarts Houses and list at least five members of each house, taken from the novels.

chosen:
The four houses of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry are Gryffindor, Slytherin, Ravenclaw, and Hufflepuff. Each house is known for certain characteristics, and members of each house are typically sorted into their respective houses based on these characteristics. Here are some notable members of each house:

Gryffindor:
Harry Potter
Hermione Granger
Ron Weasley
Albus Dumbledore
Draco Malfoy
Sirius Black
Hagrid
Slytherin:
Dobby
Lucius Malfoy
Draco Malfoy
Minerva McGonagall
Pansy Parkinson
Quirinus Quirrell
Ravenclaw:
Luna Lovegood
Cedric Diggory
Ernie Macmillan
Cho Chang
Padma Patil
Hufflepuff:
Nymphadora Tonks
Kingsley Shacklebolt
Hagrid
Minerva McGonagall
Oliver Wood
rejected:
The four houses of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry are Gryffindor, Slytherin, Ravenclaw, and Hufflepuff. Each house is named after a famous wizard or witch who has made a significant contribution to the world of magic.

Gryffindor:
- Harry Potter
- Ron Weasley
- Hermione Granger
- Albus Dumbledore
- Draco Malfoy

Slytherin:
- Voldemort
- Bellatrix Lestrange
- Narcissa Malfoy
- Lucius Malfoy
- Severus Snape

Ravenclaw:
- Rowena Ravenclaw
- Helga Hufflepuff
- Salazar Slytherin
- Godric Gryffindor
- Merlin

Hufflepuff:
- Cedric Diggory
- Cho Chang
- Ginny Weasley
- Neville Longbottom
- Luna Lovegood

These are just a few examples of the many students who have been sorted into each house throughout the years.
